#summary How to build cppao

= Introduction =

C++ Active Objects (cppao) is a very small library consisting of one header file (active_object.hpp) and one source file (active_object.cpp). You can just copy them into your project.

Cppoa use C++11 (formerly, C++0x). This means that you may need to change your compiler settings.

A solution file has been provided for Visual Studio 11.

Visual Studio 11: No changes necessary.
gcc 4.4-6: Compile with "-std=c++0x -pthread"
clang 3.0 (e.g. OSX): Change compiler settings and library options.
